Demigod / 半神

- 虚构推理·岩永琴子 -
Invented Inference·Iwanaga Kotoko


「请您……」
「Please...」

「请您成为，我们的智慧之神。」
「We implore you, to become our God of Wisdom.」

转瞬已是八年。
Time flying, it is a blink of eight years since the great turn of my life.

于虚幻和现实间，梦一般醒来。
Every day I wake up in the dreamy image entwined with illusion and reality.

阳光朗照，蔷薇满庭。
Slanting through the window, the radiant sunlight casts golden luster on the yard bloomed with roses.

殊不知，安宁与祥和，总是寓于阴森潜匿着伺机而动的秩序危机中。
You know, the semblance of peace, however, is always implicit in the surging underflow of crisis.

天降大任，我的使命，便是以智慧展开虚构推理，守护秩序。
Endowed with wisdom, I am accredited to take up the cudgels for the order by performing invented inferences.

除了合理的虚构真相，绝对真相亦为虚构。
The reasonable truth is invented as well as the absolute one.

用“谗言”打破这些不堪一击的谗言，没有硝烟的战争一触即发。
To break the rumors with "rumors", I am in full swing for the cyberwar without the smoke of gunpowder.

无论是人类，还是妖怪、魔、幽灵，一切皆存在，一切皆有其存在的秩序。
Any existence, regardless of a human or a spectre, should observe the order without exception.

而一切违背秩序的行为——绝不允许！
Thus, I will never allow any disobedience!

以左腿和右眼为交换，而变得接近神明，并非祸事。
It is not an evil deed that my left leg and right eye were taken. Since I have ever become closer to the deity.

相反，我感激命运的安排。
I am grateful to the fate, instead.

为了秩序，无论合理性的虚构，超越真实的虚构，皆将一一构筑。
If necessary, the invented inferences are sure to be created for the maintenance of order, no matter being beyond rationality or not.

我是神化的存在——
I am the demigod of wisdom,

往来虚实之间，守护此世。
who alternatively threads across illusions and reality to long guard the world.
